title: Requirements Gathering
body: Initial meeting with client to discuss and agree on projects’ goal. This is where we document project requirements.

title: Strategy and Research
body: If a client doesn’t have a strategy or a plan to achieve project goals, we help the client decide by performing industry and competitor research.

title: Content Development
body: We use the findings from the strategy and research stage to develop a content plan and structure that will help clients achieve their goal.

title: Website Development
body: We begin the design process which starts from making wireframes to designing high-fidelity designs. We start development after agreeing on a design.

title: Launch & Support
body: If the client is satisfied with the output and functionality, we launch the site and start preparing for post-launch support. (Includes improving SEO)
